channel.title: Please help me!
channel.description: Ok so i downloaded this new source "Runelive" and when i check on runelocus.com status checker it says its [COLOR="lime"][B]ONLINE[/B][/COLOR].but now when my friend tries to login to test it out it tells him "Error Conencting to server."when im on it.please can someone help me please.

item.title: Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @Untrimmed Untrimmed
item.description:
@Untrimmed wrote:

Make sure that you changed the ip in Gui.java or whatever file you have that contains the ip to your ip. You also need to port forward your router.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @fatal_chemical fatal chemical
item.description:
